text: Serena Williams was the defending champion, but was forced to withdraw due to a left knee tendonitis. Ai Sugiyama won the title by defeating Kim Clijsters 3–6, 7–5, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== The first four seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Category:State Farm Women's Tennis Classic Category:2003 WTA Tour
title: 2003 State Farm Women's Tennis Classic – Singles
